price: 41. Ir iš tiesų, kas atkeršija po to kai kentėjo blogį, tam nėra nieko (kaltės) prieš juos.
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
